name: FleetWit: It pays to be smart
name_original: FleetWit: It pays to be smart
description:
FleetWit is the only trivia app that awards real CASH prizes for playing, puzzles, brain games, and more!

Race LIVE against other FleetWit players and compete for cash prizes using both your intelligence and speed. Redeem prizes within 30 minutes of winning. FleetWit is like a game show at your fingertips… 24/7.

Still unsure about FleetWit? Here’s why you’ll love it:

- Win REAL cash prizes 24/7
- CHALLENGE your friends to trivia matches in any category
- Compete LIVE against other players all day long
- Train your BRAIN with puzzles, brain-teasers, and genius questions
- Remain SHARP and focused in your spare time by playing
- Build trivia knowledge and LEARN new things constantly

PLUS, enjoy other features when you download the app:

+ Receive notifications when your live race is about to start
+ Immediate login when you open the app
+ Helpful alerts according to your preferences

So what are you waiting for? Go win some money already!

Any other questions or concerns? Email us hello@fleetwit.com and we’d love to help you out.

Follow us on social for helpful hints, clues, and entertaining videos to keep your mind sharp throughout your FleetWit experience!

Happy racing!
